original_text: And when the tabernacle was taken down, the sons of Gershon and the sons of Merari, who carried the tabernacle, set out.
korean_text: 이에 성막을 걷으매 게르손 자손과 므라리 자손이 성막을 메고 출발하였으며

sentences.original_text: And when the tabernacle was taken down,
the sons of Gershon and the sons of Merari,
